method.name: getExported
method.description:
Allows to check if current dependency is transitive, i.e. is visible to the module which depends on module that has current dependency.

returns:true if current dependency is transitive; false otherwise

method.name: getScope
method.description:
scope of the current dependency. Not-null all the time

returns:scope

property.name: exported
property.description:
Allows to check if current dependency is transitive, i.e. is visible to the module which depends on module that has current dependency.

returns:true if current dependency is transitive; false otherwise

property.name: scope
property.description:
scope of the current dependency. Not-null all the time

returns:scope
